snippet: Two correction officers and a captain were arrested on charges that they had beaten an inmate unconscious with a baton and then tried to cover it up, the authorities said.
abstract: New York City correction officers April Jackson and Tyrone Wint and Captain Moises Simancas are arrested on charges that they handcuffed and beat an inmate unconscious with a baton at Rikers Island in October 2012 and then falsified documents to cover it up; arrests are part of inquiry by city's Investigation Department into lawless conduct at the prison complex.
lead_paragraph: Two correction officers and a captain were arrested on charges that they had beaten an inmate unconscious with a baton and then tried to cover it up, the authorities said.

headline.main: 3 Rikers Officials Charged in Brutal Beating of Inmate
headline.print_headline: 3 Charged in Beating of Inmate at Rikers
